price: Na bimwe mu bimenyetso bye ni amato manini ameze nk’imisozi agendera mu nyanja.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
